# geomclone

## Example

```{r usual}
library(ggplot2)

p <- ggplot(iris, aes(Sepal.Length, Petal.Length)) +
  geom_line(colour = alpha("red", 0.5), size = 5) +
  theme_minimal()

p
```

```{r clone}
library(geomclone)

p + geom_clone(colour = alpha("blue", 0.5))
```
